q1: How does the word counter work?
a1: Simply paste or type your text in the input area. The counter instantly analyzes your text and shows the number of words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, and estimated reading/speaking time.
q2: Is my text stored on any server?
a2: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your text is never uploaded or stored anywhere.
q3: What is the reading time based on?
a3: Reading time is estimated at 200 words per minute (average adult reading speed). Speaking time uses 130 words per minute.
